::Scrat::

Still trembling in fear, Scrat lifts one of his tiny hands, looking 
under it at Perplex, his green eyes wide with fright.

"Y-you won't eat me?"





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> At that exact moment, Zeni was crying and pleading for Scrat not to 
hurt
> him.
> 
> Perplex: Wait, you! We're not going to hurt you, don't run! Oops, I 
mean, we
> won't hurt you, don't be afraid of us, oops.
> 
> Everything Perplex said ended up sounding like he wanted Scrat to 
stay so he
> could perhaps trick him and kill him, which he had no intention 
of...
